thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30

title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30
text:
DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30 Published 7:02 PM ET Wed, 7 March 2018 Reuters 
For other diaries, please see: 
Top Economic Events 
This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events 

THURSDAY, MARCH 8 
** BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand Governor Veerathai Santiprabhob holds a news conference and is expected to unveil new banknotes featuring new king Vajiralongkorn - 0400 GMT. ACAPULCO, Mexico - The Mexican Banking Association will host its annual convention in Acapulco with keynote speeches from Mexico's President Enrique Peña Nieto, central bank governor Alejandro Díaz de León, and Finance Minister José Antonio González Anaya. 
LIMA Central bank of Peru interest rate decision. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. 
FRIDAY, MARCH 9 
** MANILA - Philippines' Bank of Makati, a thrift lender, holds a media conference on its expansion plans - 0130 GMT 
MONDAY, MARCH 12 
** SAO PAULO, Brazil - The central bank releases results of a weekly economic survey with more than 100 financial institutions. This will include forecasts for GDP, interest rates and inflation rates - 1100 GMT SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the Seamless Australia Payments Conference 2340 GMT. 
TUESDAY, MARCH 13 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. 
SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the KangaNews DCM Summit 2205 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 
** PRAGUE - Czech National Bank Governor Jiri Rusnok at the CNB's Round table "CNB Monetary Policy and Interest Rate Development" with the subtitle "Return to normal while remaining relaxed by the ECB's policy" - 0900 GMT. ANKARA - Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey releases the minutes of its March monetary policy committee meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting 1300 GMT. 
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy 0830GMT. SYDNEY - Speech by Guy Debelle, RBA Deputy Governor, at the Financial Risk Day - 2245 GMT. 
MONDAY, MARCH 19 BUENOS AIRES G20 meeting of finance ministers and central bankers in Buenos Aires (to March 20). SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria monetary policy meeting (to March 20). 
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 SYDNEY - Panel participation by Michele Bullock, Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the ASIC Annual Forum 2018, Sydney 0415 GMT. BRASILIA - Central Bank of Brazil monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting 0030 GMT. RABAT - Bank of Morocco holds monetary policy meeting. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank board of governors meeting. (to March 22). 
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds monetary policy meeting. 
FRIDAY, MARCH 23 
MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. 
MONDAY, MARCH 26 CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to March 28). 
TUESDAY, MARCH 27 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Investment Implementation Summit 0045 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy meeting. No interest rate announcement is expected. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 28 
BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting. 
THURSDAY, MARCH 29 
SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meetings to announce interest rates. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank monetary policy meeting. 
TUESDAY, APRIL 3 
SINGAPORE Singapore hosts the ASEAN finance ministers and central bank governors' meetings (to April 6) SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting 0430 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 4 
TIRANA Bank of Albania's Financial Stability Report 2017 H2. COLOMBO - Central Bank of Sri Lanka monetary policy report. 
FRIDAY, APRIL 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its March 2018 monetary policy meeting. 
TUESDAY, APRIL 10 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to April 11). BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 11 
WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds Monetary Policy Meeting. PERTH - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the Australia-Israel Chamber of Commerce (WA), Perth - 0545 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its March 2018 rate-setting meeting 1200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. 
THURSDAY, APRIL 12 LIMA Central bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds a monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. 
FRIDAY, APRIL 13 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Financial Stability Review 0130 GMT. 
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting. 
MONDAY, APRIL 16 
KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision. JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina holds press conference on monetary policy report. 
TUESDAY, APRIL 17 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting 0130 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 18 
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to April 19). 
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (no interest rate announcement). ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting. 
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meets to announce interest rates. 
CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting. 
FRIDAY, APRIL 27 
MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland release the minutes of its monitory policy meeting. 
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
